attributes.action: LEAVE THE UK ALONG WITH HIS CABINET
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So we the real British can make our country great once more .
Britain is considered a joke by most other countries i know i go there all the time .

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
